Detailed Description

This class provides a simple document element of the QtOpenCascade Toolkit.

This class provides a interactive QObject derived container for both the AIS context and its View manager, providing a very simple "document" model,

Author:
Peter C. Dolbey

void QoccViewerContext::gridXZ ( void   )  [slot]

Sets the privileged plane to the XZ Axis.

Note the negative direction of the Y axis. This is corrrect for a right-handed co-ordinate set.
